entry.title: 3M 6529 - Precision Masking Tape (3/4 Inch x 180 ft) 7000120100
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Masking Tapes
Price: 8.92

[shortdesc]

3M Precision Masking Tape, 06529, 3/4 in x 180 ft (19.1 mm x 55 m)

  • Smooth, ultra-thin and strong, 3M™ Precision Masking Tape is excellent for critical edge paint performance, helping auto body painters produce sharp paint lines using solvent and waterborne paint systems
  • Its paper backing helps produce very low paint edges with enough strength to pull through layers of colour and clear coat
  • 3M™ Precision Masking Tape, 06529, is ideal for two-tone separation, bumper black out areas and back masking.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Application General/Bulk Masking
    Color Green
    Length 180 ft
    Width 3/4 Inch
    Origin Country Japan
    Product Type Masking Tapes

    Extra Product Information

  • Coated with an acrylic adhesive to provide excellent UV resistance and adhesion to metal, glass and painted surfaces
  • The smooth backing and even adhesion provide less chance of imprinting on freshly painted and delicate surfaces
  • A high performance maski

    • Product Information

  • Helps prevent seepage and edge bleed
  • Ultra-thinness is great for two-tone jobs
  • Acrylic adhesive provides excellent UV resistance
  • Produces crisp, sharp paint lines
  • Semitransparent for increased visibility

    • Suggested Application

  • Perfect for applications where sharp, low-profile paint edges are critical, such as two-tone paint jobs, bumper blackout and painting around details like nameplates
  • Compatible with solvent and waterborne paint systems

entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Masking Tapes
Price: 4.15

[shortdesc]

Scotch® Masking Tape for Hard-to-Stick Surfaces, 2060-24, green, 1 in, 24mm x 55m, individually wrapped

  • Scotch® Rough Surface Painter’s Tape has a very strong adhesive designed for performance on rough, non-damageable surfaces
  • Use on brick, concrete, stucco, or rough wood for the protection you need to get the job done
  • Scotch® Rough Surface Painter’s Tape is recommended for use with or on lacquer coatings
  • This tape holds to surfaces for up to 5 days and then removes easily without leaving any sticky residue behind.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotch
    Adhesive Type Rubber
    Application Baseboards, Ceilings, Floors, Furniture, Hardware, Trim, Walls, Windows
    Backing Material Crape Paper
    Color Green
    Length 55m
    Width 24mm
    Origin Country Canada
    Product Type Masking Tapes
    Thickness 6.6 mil

    Extra Product Information

  • For great paint results, make sure the surface is clean, dry, and dust-free so that the tape sticks properly
  • Next, apply the Scotch® Rough Surface Painter's Tape onto the surface while pressing down firmly as you go
  • Let the tape set for about 30 to 60 m

    • Product Information

  • 5-day clean removal leaves behind no damage or sticky residue
  • Bonds aggressively, yet has a smooth unwind
  • Very strong adhesive for the toughest surfaces
  • Conforms to corners, edges, and straight lines
  • Easily mark up tape with measurements or notes
  • Versatile tape for use by professionals and homeowners alike

    • Suggested Application

  • Ideal for surfaces such as stucco, concrete, grout and brick
